ValidationRule.description: Makes the field not editable for a number of profiles where the BIS ID is not blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(National_Account_I__c), NOT(ISNULL(Bis_ID__c)), OR( $Profile.Name = 'Core Manager', $Profile.Name = 'Core Manager Admin', $Profile.Name = 'Core Manager Trainer', $Profile.Name = 'Core Sales', $Profile.Name = 'Core Sales Administration', $Profile.Name = 'Core Sales Trainer', $Profile.Name = 'Core Selling Manager', $Profile.Name = 'Core Zone Administration', $Profile.Name = 'HNBF Sales Administration', $Profile.Name = 'HNBF Sales Manager', $Profile.Name = 'HNBF Sales Rep', $Profile.Name = 'HRS PEO-ASO Sales - SB', $Profile.Name = 'HRS Regional Sales Admin - SB', $Profile.Name = 'HRS Sales Administration - SB', $Profile.Name = 'HRS Sales Manager - SB', $Profile.Name = 'HRS Sales Manager Admin - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Manager - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Manager Admin - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Marketing', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Sales - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Sales DSA - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Sales ZSA - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Selling Manager - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MMS Senior Manager - SB', $Profile.Name = 'MSP Manager', $Profile.Name = 'MSP Rep' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field is not editable if the record has a BIS ID.
